rules:
Welcome to Sprinks N' Drinks!

1. Be respectful of ALL staff members! (No blocking/muting)

2. Be kind to your fellow drinkees, leave any and all issues in the yard!

3. No racism, sexism, etc BAD isms!

4. 18+ ONLY INSTANCE!!!

5. Tip your dealers with some drinks ;P

6. Get drunk, Get high, and have a good time!

Wanna join the party? Join our discord: https://discord.gg/GHUuh5FtVt
infoBoard:
Do you like to party?

Well you came to the right place!

You have arrived into a Sprinks N' Drinks SMASHED INSTANCE!

So grab a drink, take a toke, and just have a good muhfcking time!
Join our discord ya goober: https://discord.gg/GHUuh5FtVtHelp Contribute to Cody Perry's Funeral: https://gofund.me/6a46bfb6
